abstract: New York State has passed a new interpretation of tax law that meant to force Amazon.com and other online stores to collect sales tax. The state is threatening to audit any company that does not comply by June 1.
snippet: New York State has passed a new interpretation of tax law that meant to force Amazon.com and other online stores to collect sales tax. The state is threatening to audit any company that does not comply by June 1.
lead_paragraph: CORRECTED | 4:40 PMNew York State’s novel interpretation of its taxing powers over Internet sales will likely get a test in court.

headline.main: New York State Girds for War With Amazon
